description: Try our easy to follow Easy Tuna Nicoise Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easy Tuna Nicoise Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place eggs into a saucepan of warm water. Cover and bring to the boil over medium-high heat. Cook for 2 minutes. Drain and rinse under cold water.
Transfer the tuna to a bowl and flake. Add tomato, olives, onion and beans.
Whisk dressing ingredients together in a jug. Drizzle the dressing over salad, reserving some for serving. Toss to coat.
Pile lettuce leaves onto serving plates. Top with tuna mixture. Shell eggs and halve. Arrange on top of salad. Finish with remaining dressing. Serve.
